info.title: express API
info.description: Express + Nodejs backend for auth and user management

JWT.description: JWT token to authenticate the user

post.description: Endpoint that allow the user to sign up on the platform

requestBody.description: The data of the login form

201.description: User created and return the jwt token with the data of the user created

value.message: Some error ocurred while creating the user

requestBody.description: Post the necessary fields for the API to create a new user.

post.description: Validate the data for the new user and if it proceed create a new one
Endpoint that makes the user logout of the platform

404.description: Not Found (No user associated to the query params)

500.description: Internal Server Error (While finding the user or sending the email)

get.description: Endpoint that makes the server send an email with the password token associated to the username and the email given as query parameters

404.description: Not Found (user not associated to token)

value.message: Some error ocurred while changing the password

put.description: This endpoint allow the user to change the password in case he has forgotten it

404.description: Not Found (user no associated to the token)

parameters.name: jwtSocialAuth
parameters.description: Cookie that stores the id, and last only 10 minutes

requestBody.description: Contains the info of the user to complete the register with social auth

get.description: Endpoint used as the guard to access to the main view

parameters.description: The jwt token containing the id

User.title: User
User.description: User model that identifies it by role

id.description: Unique identifier for the given user.
